ygData.subject: Re: Correction....
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 8 song lowers reaction time and two things referred to in the strat guide as Help and AGRO, though I haven t figured out how those translate into the
ygData.messageBody:
Level 8 song lowers reaction time and two things referred to in the strat
guide as "Help and AGRO," though I' haven't figured out how those translate
into the game...

nafai

----- Original Message -----
From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 8:54 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Correction....


> From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>
>
> Let's settle an debated issue while we are at it. I don't believe the
Level
> 8 song works, at least that's what I have been hearing. All it does is say
> "A Skeleton Looks Sad" without actually slowing him down (which I believe
> is what it was supposed to do). Can anyone speak authoritatively to
whether
> it indeed does work?
>
> -Musil
>
> At 06:27 PM 4/18/99 , you wrote:
> >From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
> >
> >Fenidune, if you take the boat to Butcherblock, look for Paralto...I will
be
> >glad to guide you to Kelethin where you can buy both the level 8 and 9
> >songs. Be sure to bring plenty of money though! I just bought my level
9
> >song for 4 plat, 6 gold, if I remember correctly.
> >
> > Paralto
> >
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: A.Rubman [mailto:Naturdoc@...]
> >> Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 2:32 PM
> >> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Correction....
> >>
> >>
> >> From: "A.Rubman" <Naturdoc@...>
> >>
> >> Ah ya must be a Freeport Lad eh? *grins* No need to get excited my
> >> friend, the Bardic guild of freeport wants you to travel and visit our
> >> compatriots in other lands. For level 8 I'd suggest taking the boat
ride
> >> to Kelethin and visiting our wood-elf songweavers. For level 9 either
> >> the grand port town of Qeynos or Kelthin as well will have the tunes
you
> >> are seeking. Enjoy the music my brother, and remember a song is but a
> >> way to change people's minds.
> >>
> >>
> >> ((There is a great bards guide, not to saye Jythri's page is not good,
> >> but for cold hard facts and hints "http://bardsguide.dhs.org/" is the
> >> all around best for Bardic info))
> >>
> >> -Luini-
> >> Half-Elf serving Marr on Innoruk
> >>
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: Stanley <shorty69@...>
> >> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >> Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 3:06 PM
> >> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Correction....
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: "Stanley" <shorty69@...>
> >> >
> >> >Does anyone know where to buy the lvl 8 and 9 songs? i cant find them
> >> >anywhere!?!!?
> >> >Thanks
> >> >Fenidune
> >> >-----Original Message-----
> >> >From: JR McConnell <jr@...>
> >> >To: EverQuest Bards Mailing List <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >> >Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 3:02 PM

> >> >> I ment to say Kala, at the Hall o Justace, sorry but I was a bit
> >> >>flustered and got my places mixed up. I must remember to stop at the
> >> tavern
> >> >>AFTER I write in my journal not before... :)
> >> >>
> >> >>An Ever so appoligenic SnoLynx, Gentalmen Bard of Freeport...
